name: Sundar Pichai
title: CEO of Alphabet Inc. and Google
quote: AI is probably the most important thing humanity has ever worked on. I think of it as something more profound than electricity or fire.

name: Satya Nadella
title: CEO of Microsoft
quote: AI is the defining technology of our times. It has the potential to augment human capabilities and transform every industry.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
title: CEO of Meta (formerly Facebook)
quote: The real story of AI is that it can amplify people's capabilities and help them do more in the world.

name: Elon Musk
title: CEO of Tesla and SpaceX
quote: AI is a fundamental risk to the existence of human civilization, in a way that car accidents, airplane crashes, faulty drugs, or bad food were not.

name: Ginni Rometty
title: former CEO of IBM
quote: Some people call this artificial intelligence, but the reality is this technology will enhance us. So instead of artificial intelligence, I think we’ll augment our intelligence.

name: Jeff Bezos
title: founder of Amazon
quote: It’s a renaissance, it’s a golden age. We are now solving problems with machine learning and artificial intelligence that were... in the realm of science fiction for the last several decades.

name: Fei-Fei Li
title: Co-Director of the Stanford Human-Centered AI Institute
quote: As a technologist, I see how AI and the fourth industrial revolution will impact every aspect of people’s lives.

name: Tim Cook
title: CEO of Apple
quote: The future of AI is about amplifying human capabilities. AI must respect human values and be designed with ethics and privacy in mind.
